document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a06848">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#447cff">laid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a8ff">simple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">Hat </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#447cff">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">mighty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c88cff">Shelf </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">Unobserved </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc4a4">Ribbon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc4a4">dropt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">Snatch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yourself! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
